attributes.action: Keep existing units of measurements for markings and sales. Stop consultation.
attributes.additional_details: Consumers and businesses don't want or need this and money will be better spent elsewhere.
attributes.background: We want a government to stop this unnecessary exercise which is just a political post-Brexit stunt with no real benefit to consumers or businesses. If not, Parliament should hold the government to account for wasting civil servants' time and taxpayer's money.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617540
